channel.title: Lithium 474
channel.description:
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/17/documentation.png/][IMG]http://img17.imageshack.us/img17/8461/documentation.png[/img][/URL]
[size=11pt]As you may know I still have an outstanding project; UnixPk. This project has been delayed, possibly cancelled as I'm just not feeling it any more. I always did like the 474 revision and I've always wanted to program it, so here I am. I've already had a look around the packaging and networking; it seems quite fun and easy to use. As I've been looking around I've become a lot familiar with the classes, so I've added some core features. The base is an original 474 with mina networking.[/size]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/705/21895391.png/][IMG]http://img705.imageshack.us/img705/1004/21895391.png[/img][/URL]
[ul][li][color=navy]Thieving; npc thieving and half stall thieving [/li] [li][color=navy]Cooking; all food types cook-able[/li] [li][color=navy]Firemaking; most logs light-able (not clipped yet)[/li] [li][color=navy]All food types edible[/li] [li][color=navy]474 maps (some still need fixing and adding) [/li] [li][color=navy]Real melee forumlas - very good combat[/li] [li][color=navy]Decent magic formulas - still working on it[/li] [li][color=navy]No range yet[/li] [li]Fully working music system - yeah bitch[/li][/ul]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/707/25111806.png/][IMG]http://img707.imageshack.us/img707/9666/25111806.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/269/39828463.png/][IMG]http://img269.imageshack.us/img269/5536/39828463.png[/img][/URL] Login screen - still missing a few things. [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/696/87155744.png/][IMG]http://img696.imageshack.us/img696/7012/87155744.png[/img][/URL]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/aw6whz.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/k3rgwx.gif[/img]
[size=13pt]Website - developing[/size]
[size=12pt]Credits: Graham Blake Scu11[/size]

item.title: Lithium 474
item.dc:creator: @X_Entinity_X X Entinity X
item.description:
@X_Entinity_X wrote:

[size=11pt]As you may know I still have an outstanding project; UnixPk. This project has been delayed, possibly cancelled as I’m just not feeling it any more.
I always did like the 474 revision and I’ve always wanted to program it, so here I am. I’ve already had a look around the packaging and networking; it seems quite fun and easy to use. As I’ve been looking around I’ve become a lot familiar with the classes, so I’ve added some core features.
The base is an original 474 with mina networking.[/size]

[ul][li][color=navy]Thieving; npc thieving and half stall thieving [/li]
[li][color=navy]Cooking; all food types cook-able[/li]
[li][color=navy]Firemaking; most logs light-able (not clipped yet)[/li]
[li][color=navy]All food types edible[/li]
[li][color=navy]474 maps (some still need fixing and adding) [/li]
[li][color=navy]Real melee forumlas - very good combat[/li]
[li][color=navy]Decent magic formulas - still working on it[/li]
[li][color=navy]No range yet[/li]
[li]Fully working music system - yeah bitch[/li][/ul]



Login screen - still missing a few things.
